Prettify R source code

Performs various substitutions in all .R files in a package (code and tests). Carefully examine the results after running this function!

style_pkg(pkg = ".", ..., style = tidyverse_style,
  transformers = style(...))

Arguments

pkg

Path to a (subdirectory of an) R package.
...

Passed on to the style function.
style

The unquoted name of a style guide to use. Will not be used further except to construct the argument transformers. See style_guides() for details.
transformers

A set of transformer functions.

See also

Other stylers: style_dir, style_file, style_text

Other stylers: style_dir, style_file, style_text

Examples

# NOT RUN {
style_pkg()
# }
